headline.main: Recent Talk Not to Be Confused With Hitler 'Offensive'

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: Dispatches from London to sevaral American newspapers reported recently that soundings are being taken there by certain German groups, especially the German Army, as to the possibility of a negotiated peace in Europe if Hitler and the Nazis were to be overthrown from within.
abstract: Lrs on: negotiated peace with anti-Hitler groups if Nazis are overthrown from within
